title: SLA Reporting - Backup Success Rate
description: An account manager needs to create a report for a client showing the backup success rate for all their servers over the last month.

tasks.description: Access the central backup administration console.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is logged into the backup system.

tasks.description: Generate a historical job summary report for the specific client for the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated listing all backup jobs and their status (success, warning, failure).

tasks.description: Calculate the overall success percentage and add it to the client's monthly performance report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives a clear report showing a 99.5% backup success rate for the month.
